long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the Chrome New Tab as a Notepad!
 
Everytime you open Chrome or a new tab in Chrome you will see a notepad to take notes. Capture quick ideas, save things you want to be reminded of next time you open your browser, or even take meeting or phone calls notes without need for paper.
 
Your notes are automatically saved and they will sync between your computers, as long as you are logged to your Google account.
